License

General Information

CHAI3D integrates a number of libraries from third party authors. The detailed licenses for each of the different packages can be found in the ./external directory. Please note that several options in file CGlobals.h can be configured to enable or disable support for selected haptic devices or capabilities inside the API.

Modules

The external modules located in directory ./modules, which are not part of the Core CHAI3D API, may present very different licenses compared to the BSD License of CHAI3D. For more information about the different modules, we invite you directly contact their authors for more information.
